  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static Game getInstance(GameController gameController)
      (Singleton) Get Game instance
      Parameters:
      gameController -
      Returns:
      Game Instance

    • removeInstance

      public void removeInstance()
      Set game instance to null.

      Used when exiting or game is finished.

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Start and initialize game by setting the first card and dealing seven cards to all players

    • stopGame

      public void stopGame(Player winner)
      Stop the game when finished and give players win (In case of manual exit, exitGame() in GameController.java will take care of it)
      Parameters:
      winner -

    • playerSelectCard

      public void playerSelectCard(Player p, Card c)
      Method that manage user card clicking. After checking that player can actually throw his card it updates "last card" (or table card) and then skip player turn.
      Parameters:
      p - - Player instance
      c - - Player selected cards

    • playerThrowCard

      public void playerThrowCard(Player p, Card c)
      Throw the card from the hand, called only once it is verified that the player has that card in the hand. It also check if it's the last cardplayer's hand with gameOverCheck().
      Parameters:
      p - Player Instance
      c - Card to throw

    • playerDrawCard

      public void playerDrawCard(Player p)
      Method that manage player drawing. After checking that player can actually draw, it generates a new card that will be added to player's hand.
      Parameters:
      p - Player instance

    • checkCycleForBot

      public void checkCycleForBot()
      Method that loop through bot action until it's player turn, only then the loop will stop executing, waiting for user action

    • executeBotAI

      public void executeBotAI(Player p)
      Manage single bot turn. If there are not available cards then draw, the loop will execute this function again to throw the drown card.
      like this: playerDrawCard() -> checkCycleForBot() -> this
      if he draws a valid card then throw it else skip the turn
      Parameters:
      p - - Player instance

    • DelayAndSkipTurn

      public void DelayAndSkipTurn(int ms)
      Method to manage to manage speed between turns Create a thread that wait given ms and then skip the turn
      Parameters:
      ms -

    • increasePlayerTurn

      public void increasePlayerTurn()
      Increase player turn based on gameDirection

    • increaseDrawTurn

      public void increaseDrawTurn()
      Increase player draw turn based on gameDirection

    • updateLastCard

      public void updateLastCard(Card c)
      Method that manage to update table/last card. It also call the gameController method "updateLastCardVisual" that is responsible for visual lastCard updating.

    • getNextPlayer

      public Player getNextPlayer()
      Get the next player based on gameDirection
      Returns:
      Player

    • openColorChooser

      public void openColorChooser()
      It opens the visual color chooser for letting user choose the color after he has thrown COLOR/PLUSFOUR card

    • checkSessionPlayerUnoButtonVisual

      public void checkSessionPlayerUnoButtonVisual()
      Method that manage to check if UNO button can be clicked and show it visually

    • blockNextTurn

      public void blockNextTurn()
      Block next player turn. Used with special cards

    • checkPlayerTurn

      public boolean checkPlayerTurn(Player p)
      Check if user can do actions by controlling if it's his turn
      Parameters:
      p - Player instance
      Returns:
      Is player turn?

    • isCardCastable

      public boolean isCardCastable(Card card)
      Check if card can be throwed based on lastCard
      Parameters:
      card - Card
      Returns:
      Is card castable?

    • checkSpecialCard

      public void checkSpecialCard(Card c)
      Method that is responsible for checking special custom card effect.
      Parameters:
      c - Card

    • canPlayerDraw

      public boolean canPlayerDraw()
      Check if the player can draw
      Returns:
      Can player draw?

    • canPlayerThrow

      public boolean canPlayerThrow(Player p)
      Check if player has valid card in his hand
      Parameters:
      p - Player instance
      Returns:
      Can player throw?

    • canCurrentUserSkip

      public boolean canCurrentUserSkip()
      Check if the current player (based on playerTurn value) can manually skip the turn. Player can only skip manually if he already drawn a card and he has valid card to throw in his hand
      Returns:
      Can player manually skip?

    • gameOverCheck

      public boolean gameOverCheck(Player p)
      Check if the game is finished, if the player has no card in his hand then he won
      Parameters:
      p - Player Instance
      Returns:
      Player has empty hand?

    • checkUnoButton

      public boolean checkUnoButton(Player p)
      Check if player has one card left and pressed UNO before throwing the 2nd one
      Parameters:
      p -
      Returns:
      Player has left with one card and clicked uno button

    • checkSessionPlayerHasTwoCards

      public boolean checkSessionPlayerHasTwoCards()
      Check if sessionPlayer has two cards in hand, this is needed to check if the player can actually press the UNO button.
      Returns:
      Session player has two cards in hand

    • addCardToPlayer

      public void addCardToPlayer(Player player)
      Give a card to the player
      Parameters:
      player - Player to give card

      public void initializeSevenCard()
      Give 7 card to anyone in game

      Add player to the game
